concept.title: Release 11.5.4
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.5.4 includes the following new features.

ul.li: New meeting info display - When in a meeting, you can tap the title at the top of the display to show information about the meeting such as are guests allowed, is the meeting moderated, or password protected.

New cellular data preferences - Users can now decide how the meeting behaves when not using a WiFi connection. By default, the user will join a meeting in audio-only mode and not be able to download or play meeting recordings while not on WiFi. However, the user can change their cellular data preferences to override the default behavior.
Built in QR code reader - Users can scan QR codes for easy community configuration from within the app.
